name: Game Modifier: Blood Rush
desc:
A game mode that makes everything bloodier!
For the latest news on our modes, follow @TCMModes on X and join our Discord server.

name: Grandpa Rework
desc: Incapacitating Grandpa disables him for 90 seconds. During that time, he cannot be interacted with.

name: Grandpa levelling units
desc:
The following actions affects Grandpa's blood level:
Leatherface cutting barricades: 12 blood
Leatherface destroying crawl spaces: 12 blood
Cook succesful pings: 10 blood
Victim triggering Hitchhiker's traps: 30 blood
Victim executed: 30 blood
Victim detected by grandpa when near him: 20 blood
Victim found in hiding spot: 75 blood
Victim escaped: -75 blood

name: Victims bleedout
desc: Victims bleedout has been increased.

name: Health bottles
desc:
Big health bottles give 20% more HP.
Small health bottles give 40% more HP.

name: Toughness Attribute Rework
desc:
Toughness has been increased has follows:
From level 10 to 39: 10% Increase in HP
From level 40-50: 15% increase in HP.

name: Blood Harvesting Attribute Rework
desc:
Blood Harvesting has been increased has follows:
From level 10 to 39: Family gets 20% more blood from buckets
From level 40-49: Family gets 30% more blood from buckets
Level 50: Family gets 70% more blood from buckets

name: Maria Ability:
desc: LVL 3, right path: Each time you sweet-talk Grandpa his level will be reduced by 1, has a cooldown of 3 minutes.

name: Connie Ability:
desc:
LVL 3, left path: Reduce ability cooldown to 180 seconds, at the cost of 75 health and 180 seconds proximity debuff.
LVL 3, middle path: Reduce ability cooldown to 240 seconds seconds, at the cost of 50 health and 10 seconds proximity debuff.
LVL 3, right path: 300 base cooldown, 30 seconds proximity debuff, no health cost.

name: Leland Ability:
desc: LVL 1, middle path: After barging a Family member, 40 HP is restored.

name: Virginia Ability:
desc:
LVL 1, middle path: You can now recharge your ability bar by 50 points when you contaminate a blood bucket.
LVL 1, left path: Increase contamination duration by 90 seconds
LVL 2, right path: Increase contamination duration by 60 seconds

name: Universal Perks (All Victims):
desc:
The following 3 perks are available for all victims.
Selecting these existing perks in the game will now grant new effects, detailed below.

If you want this perk -> Equip this one in game

name: SOS
desc: Victims see your aura at all times.

name: Tourniquet
desc: After consuming a health item, you don't bleed out for 90 seconds.

name: Back For Blood
desc: When sneak attacking Grandpa you decrease Family bond by an extra 30% and heal for 50% health.

name: Universal Perks (All Family):
desc:
The following 3 perks are available for all Family.
Selecting these existing perks in the game will now grant new effects, detailed below.

If you want this perk -> Equip this one in game

name: Blood Banker
desc: Your maximum blood storage capacity is increased by 50%.

name: You'll Pay For That!
desc: If Grandpa is incapacitated, your damage dealt to Victims is increased by 35% until he recovers.

name: Tracker Tagged
desc: Hitting a Victim highlights them for all Family members. Highlight duration is 8 seconds.

name: Perk changes
desc: The following perks have been changed:

name: Surgical
desc: You receive 150% more blood when attacking Victims.

name: Sip Sip Sip
desc: Melee attacks give 100% more blood in your vial, but attack damage is reduced by 20%.

name: Serrated
desc: Victims hit by the Perk holder take 0.5 HP per second of extra damage for the next 10 seconds.

name: Heart Attack
desc: A victim's bleed out increases by 1 HP per second for 60 seconds if they trigger an electric trap or are hit by the perk holder's barge.

name: Rough Cut
desc: Hitting a Victim with the chainsaw causes 1 HP of extra damage per second for 14 seconds.

name: Hurt Em'
desc: Barbed wire traps do 30 damage. Increases the damage dealt to a Victim caught in barbed wire for 45 seconds if they continue to run while barbed wire is attached to them.

name: Venom
desc: Victims caught in traps take 1 HP of extra damage per second for 45 seconds.

name: Toxic Cloud
desc: The poison seeps into the Victim's wounds, causing them to lose 1 HP per second for the next 30 seconds.

name: Sanguine Shadow
desc: If you drop below 70%, it can be refilled slowly by staying hidden and motionless in shadows or hiding spots. Health received is 3 HP per second.

name: Medical Benefits
desc: Healing a fellow Victim also heals yourself. The amount of health received will be 125% of total healing applied to your teammate.

name: Extra Drip
desc: After using a health item, you will continue to receive 4 HP for 12 seconds.

name: Safety In Numbers
desc: While all Victims are alive and before any have escaped, you receive 30% bonus to your max health and stamina.

name: Bounce Back Better
desc: Healing items used on you are 50% more effective. Counts for being healed and healing yourself.

name: Blood Clot Cry
desc: Receive 30 health whenever Grandpa activates his Sonar ability. Has infinite charges.

name: Pep Talk
desc: Sweet-talking Grandpa heals you by 40% of your maximum HP.
